Name: GroupAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a group is added to the diagram.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that was added.

Name: GroupAddedToGroupEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a group is added to another group.

Parameters.Name: ParentModel
Parameters.Documentation: The parent group to which the child group was added.

Parameters.Name: AddedGroup
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Groups.IGroup" /> that was added.

Name: GroupClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@onclick</c> event occurs on a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.MouseEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupDoubleClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@ondblclick</c> event occurs on a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.MouseEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupPaddingChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the internal padding of a group changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group whose padding changed.

Parameters.Name: OldPadding
Parameters.Documentation: The old padding value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: NewPadding
Parameters.Documentation: The new padding value in pixels.

Name: GroupPointerDownEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer (e.g., mouse or touch) is pressed down on a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupPointerEnterEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer enters the bounds of a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupPointerLeaveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer leaves the bounds of a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupPointerMoveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer moves over a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupPointerUpEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer is released from a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.PointerEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupPositionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a group position changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group the moved.

Parameters.Name: OldX
Parameters.Documentation: The old X position value.

Parameters.Name: OldY
Parameters.Documentation: The old Y position value.

Parameters.Name: NewX
Parameters.Documentation: The new X position value.

Parameters.Name: NewY
Parameters.Documentation: The new Y position value.

Name: GroupRedrawEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a redraw is manually requested for a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that requested the redraw.

Name: GroupRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a group is removed from the diagram.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that was removed.

Name: GroupRemovedFromGroupEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a child group is removed from its parent group.

Parameters.Name: ParentModel
Parameters.Documentation: The parent group from which the child group was removed.

Parameters.Name: RemovedGroup
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Groups.IGroup" /> that was removed.

Name: GroupSelectionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the selection state of a group changes (e.g., selected or deselected).

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group whose selection state changed.

Name: GroupSizeChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the size (width or height) of a group changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group whose size changed.

Parameters.Name: OldWidth
Parameters.Documentation: The previous width value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: OldHeight
Parameters.Documentation: The previous height value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: NewWidth
Parameters.Documentation: The new width value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: NewHeight
Parameters.Documentation: The new height value in pixels.

Name: GroupVisibilityChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the visibility state of a group changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group whose visibility state changed.

Name: GroupWheelEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the mouse wheel is scrolled while over a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Args
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.WheelEventArgs" />.

Name: GroupZIndexChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when <see cref="!:IGroup.ZIndex" /> changes;

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group that triggered the event.

Name: NodeAddedToGroupEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is added to a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group the node was added to.

Parameters.Name: Node
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that was added.

Name: NodeRemovedFromGroupEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is removed from a group.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group the node was removed from.

Parameters.Name: Node
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that was removed.

Name: PortAddedToGroupEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is added directly to a group's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group the port was added to.

Parameters.Name: Port
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Ports.IPort" /> that was added.

Name: PortRemovedFromGroupEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is removed from a group's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The group the port was removed from.

Parameters.Name: Port
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Ports.IPort" /> that was removed.
